description: Metrics to Monitor AlwaysOn Availability Groups Health

list.definition:
select distinct srvname = sql_instance from dbo.instance_details with (nolock)
where is_available = 1 and is_enabled = 1
list.label: Sql Instance
list.name: server
list.query:
select distinct srvname = sql_instance from dbo.instance_details with (nolock)
where is_available = 1 and is_enabled = 1

list.label: Database
list.name: database

list.label: Is Local SQL Instance
list.name: is_local

list.description: Threshold duration in minutes for Long Running Queries
list.label: Latency (Min)
list.name: latency_minutes

list.label: IP Address
list.name: ip

list.label: Host Name
list.name: host_name

list.label: DBA Database
list.name: dba_db

list.description: Page No Used for Paginated Result
list.label: Page No
list.name: page_no

list.label: Ag Health State Collection Time UTC
list.name: ag_health_state_collection_time_utc

list.definition:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
select distinct replica_server_name
from [$dba_db].dbo.ag_health_state ahs
where 1=1
and ahs.collection_time_utc = (select max(i.collection_time_utc) from dbo.ag_health_state i)
--
UNION ALL
--
select '__ALL__'
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

if ($is_local = 1)
  EXEC (@sql);
ELSE
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
list.label: Replica
list.name: replica_server_name
